content: अनन्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not different, identical, same, not other than, self; अनन्या राघवस्याहं भास्करस्य प्रभायथा . सा हि सत्याभिसंधानातथानन्या च भर्तरि <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} Sole, unique, without a second. {@--3@} [नास्ति अन्यः विषयो यस्य] Undivided, undistracted (mind &c.); having no other object or person to think of &c.; अनन्याश्चिंतयंतो मां ये जनाः पर्युपासते <ls>Bg. 9. 22.</ls> In <ab>comp.</ab> अनन्य may be translated by ‘not by another,’ ‘directed or devoted to no one else’, ‘having no other object.’
